help.title: Camel 1F1

key.name: s
key.desc: Start engine (OR: Click propeller/center of dash)

key.name: B
key.desc: Toggle chocks (OR: click chocks/wheels with mouse)

help.line: Starting
Press { and } once each--so that both L and R magneto switches are in center position.
Give it some throttle and hold the s key for several seconds
until you hear the engine catch.
Take Off
Zoom the view out so you can see the edges of the runway with your
peripheral vision. As you speed up, gently pull back on the stick - this
avoids the spin-out that otherwise happens around 40-45 MPH.
As you lift off, about 45 MPH, the torque of the engine will twist
you clockwise--counter it with the stick. Just a slight pressure back
and then left is all it takes to counter these effects.
Similarly, be prepared to use gentle rudder pressure to counter a tendency to
yaw just after takeoff.
The blip switch
The blip switch (b) disengages both magnetos and cuts power.
Engaging either R or L brake (via keyboard, joystick, or rudder/pedals)
also engages the blip switch. Releasing the brake (or pressing the b key)
releases the blip switch.
Approach and landing
Speed 55 MPH IAS
Throttle OPEN
Use the blip switch to control speed NOT throttle
Blip switch ON/OFF as required
Touchdown speed: 50-55 MPH IAS
Stall speed 48 MPH IAS
Guns
Guns have 250 rounds each, the maximum capacity of the Camel.
Note that guns will not work if AI models are disabled (the bullets
and smoke are AI objects - tracer rounds will appear but they won't move).
Fire with the e key or a joystick trigger linked to /controls/armament/trigger.
Reload guns: Use the menu--you must be on ground and stopped.
